channel.title: [still NEED HELP]Is it possible to..[READ PLEASE]
channel.description:
Make to servers but make them both have the same character folder? :| cause like i want to make an admin server and a normal server... But like i don't know how to make the character files be shared between the two servers.
I need some proz for this

item.title: [still NEED HELP]Is it possible to..[READ PLEASE]
item.dc:creator: @mod_robby mod robby
item.description:
@mod_robby wrote:

[quote=“Zaron, post:4, topic:94504”]ok first u get like the same 2 server folders (copy and paste the server u want) (if you got hamachi or no-ip u just use that (or 2 different ones) and like you said if you want an ALL admins server or w e u keep that ip private and u giv out the free ip to every one. o and if you want the character files to be shared between the 2 folders, lie every 5-10 mins (alot of times a day) u gotta copy and paste the character files! (or get an auto clicker when you are gone and do something with that…
hope this kind of helped… lol i’m not that new but these things u just gotta think really hard on… :)[/quote]

This didn’t help sorry…I’m looking so i don’t every have to. Like for example the server for regualar players has a port of 43594 and admins got a port of *****(private) then they log in to the private one and then they log in to the other one and it will remain their stats from the admin server.

But thanks.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 13, 2007, 10:18:53 PM[/size][hr][quote=“VorargC, post:5, topic:94504”]Shit, it got deleted =
Sorry[/quote]
Ok =/ i will just speak with a CM or something. Or iff someone else comes and helps

Read full topic

item.title: [still NEED HELP]Is it possible to..[READ PLEASE]
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

ok first u get like the same 2 server folders (copy and paste the server u want) (if you got hamachi or no-ip u just use that (or 2 different ones) and like you said if you want an ALL admins server or w e u keep that ip private and u giv out the free ip to every one. o and if you want the character files to be shared between the 2 folders, lie every 5-10 mins (alot of times a day) u gotta copy and paste the character files! (or get an auto clicker when you are gone and do something with that…
hope this kind of helped… lol i’m not that new but these things u just gotta think really hard on…
